Reviews.Title: “Grimaldi Apartment”
Reviews.Author: chesterbuff
Reviews.Content: Stayed in September 2011 but have only just managed to post successfully. Delighted with 2 bedroomed apartment in Calle Della Vestre;very convenient for everything. Just off the main shoppoing street but quiet and an easy walk to St Mark's Square. They replied quickly to various email queries before we went. Anna from the company met us at the vaporetto stop (they had monitored our flight which was delayed), took us to the apartment and gave us lots of information. Apartment was more than adequate for our needs and was excellent value for such central accommodation. Would certainly use them again.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value, Clean and Comfortable & Great Location”
Reviews.Author: JimboBerlin
Reviews.Content: In Venice finding an affordable and comfortable place stay is a challenge to say the very least. It was in fact my third trip to Venice and on this occasion I stayed at the Grimaldi Apartment Hotel, which is a small property with about 15 apartments a few minutes walk from both St Marco Square as well as the Rialto Bridge. The bed and the apartment were clean and comfortable and there is even a washing machine for your dirty clothing , if you end up staying there long enough to need it. The managers of the hotel are quite friendly and helpful even recommending some nice restaurants, trattoria and places of interest. One shortcoming though is the fact that the hotel charges you 50 Euros for your stay if you use the kitchen to cook as they seem to wish to recover the cost of cleaning the kitchen in this way. One other small issue is the early check-out time of 10AM, however in some instances the hotel can give you an extra hour or so. All in all this is a good place with friendly and helpful staff and will help make your stay in Venice all the more pleasant. If you found this review helpful then please click the appropriate link confirming this fact. Thank you and happy travels.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect but not fancy”
Reviews.Author: Sueaf
Reviews.Content: Clean,well located,easy to find in a confusing place. They met us at the vaporatto, gave us a good map and the place was well equipped. If you don't want fancy, then this is your place.

Reviews.Title: “We had a great time and had exceptional service from the staff!”
Reviews.Author: DBabik
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful stay at the Stella apartment in March. Pedram went above and beyond in helping us with recommendations on things to do and places to eat. We left something behind on our visit in the apartment and he took the time to mail it back. We highly recommend Grimaldi Apartments!

Reviews.Title: “the best apartment in Venice”
Reviews.Author: adianmari
Reviews.Content: everything was perfect. Very clean and very comfortable. the best hotel in Venice

Reviews.Title: “cozy”
Reviews.Author: jo325
Reviews.Content: It is very spacious, cozy apartment located in a quiet area of Venice, and there is a very delicious seafood restaurant nearby.

Reviews.Title: “Great apartment, awesome location, and good value!”
Reviews.Author: Iowayankee20
Reviews.Content: We stayed in an apartment near St Peter's Square. It was literally 2 blocks away! Venice is not the most accessible city- so there were lots of stairs and bridges between the taxi boat and the apartment! Then there were 4 flights of stairs to the apartment! So it wasn't so awesome getting all our stuff from 2 weeks abroad there, but it was fine once we were all settled. The staff member gave us a map and told us where things were. We tried a couple of times to find the grocery store (eventually with success) but the streets of Venice are not easily mapped! But they tried- we just failed to read the map correctly! The apartment was very clean and spacious- we opened the windows at night but the pigeons made too much noise for my mom... she was afraid they'd come in. We got some groceries for breakfast and kept them in the fridge. Most hotels in Venice are really expensive, so this was a great alternative.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location just off Strada Nova”
Reviews.Author: arcoiris644
Reviews.Content: We were met as arranged at the vaporetto stop Ca D'Oro by a charming lady who escorted us to our apartment just a few minutes walk away. The apartment could have been lovely but there was far too much furniture in it that would never be used. It looked as if they had emptied out a few apartments and rather than throwing the furniture away had stuffed it all in our aparment. The decoration was very old fashioned but as we were only sleeping there, it really wasn't a problem. The location was just perfect & within easy walking distance of everywhere. We had a lovely time and would definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “Great staff, great location”
Reviews.Author: AusAcademic
Reviews.Content: I have now used Grimaldi twice - being lucky enough to be in Venice twice in two years. Both times I have had lovely apartments, and fantastic service from warm and knowledgable staff. In 09 my colleagues and I had an apartment in a tiny courtyard right in the centre - large, clean, central - but quiet. Advice given by staff was really useful and they went out of their way to be helpful. Have recommended to many friends.

Reviews.Title: “The worst ever experience”
Reviews.Author: Mukik
Reviews.Content: We had the worst ever experience with Visconti Apartments. Last year we booked the place for 2 nights for four people. We arrived in Venice 30min later than planned, due to the train delays and made contact with the organizer who insured they were waiting for us which was a lie. As soon as we got the meeting point no one was there all the phones were switched off and we waited until 3am in the middle of the street with no address, no hotel and no person to meet. They kept their phones off the next morning still as we tried to call many times. Be careful as they are very tricky - there is no address of the apartments mentioned on booking.com website or via email confirmation from them. So there was no chance to find them in Venice. They had the nerve to charge us the full 2 days stay, one week prior to our vacation. Since then, we have been in contact with them almost a year to at least refund half of our money which they originally agreed to do. They keep lying that they will refund one nights stay and they asked us 100 different papers which we kindly provided but still no results, just frustration and ignorance. The final conversation was with the financial director who mentioned that because we put their names in Trip Advisor â€“ the owner is fuming and will not pay anything because the damage is done, which infact was another lie because we only put this in trip advisor after suffering so many difficulties and lies from them. They are just very lucky that something more serious didnâ€™t happen to one of us from being left alone in the dark streets of Venice. Itâ€™s a shame on this company to ruin the names of Italians. We were a group of 4 from 4 different countries and had a meeting with another 6 international people from different places in Venice. Unfortunately the memories and thoughts about Italian hospitality is ruined for everyone.

Reviews.Title: “excellent”
Reviews.Author: gbaket
Reviews.Content: Quiet, easy to get to. Walking distance from just about anywhere in Venice. We were met by local knowledgeable staff, fluent in several languages

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Excellent Service, Good Value. Highly recommended!”
Reviews.Author: ladyhotelier
Reviews.Content: When you know that you are totally reliant on a man meeting you off a water bus to show you to your apartment, you are very relieved to see him! Pedram, who was waiting for us at Arsenale Vaporetto stop, could not have been more helpful. He helped with the luggage, recommended restaurants, checked that the apartment was satisfactory, made sure there was hot water... a very warm welcome. Our apartment (Guardi) was a ten minute walk from S, Marco in a pleasant, quiet residential area with a few local restaurants and bars - perfect for us. We tend to be out all the time, so we really only wanted somewhere to sleep and this fitted the bill perfectly, though there was a well appointed kitchenette. We had to phone Grimaldi a couple of times with queries and they could not have been more helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Apartment - CÃ  Visconti”
Reviews.Author: Hailz2
Reviews.Content: we had a disgraceful experience with these agents. They were helpful at first and we were in contact with them on our arrival. When we arrived at the meeting point they specified.. there was no one there. When we tried to contact their numbers for the next hour and wait patiently there was no answer and they had switched their phones off. We were left stranded in Venice alone with no reasoning. Luckily we managed to find a kind gentlemen that let us stay in his hotel from 2.30am, otherwise we would have been sleeping in the street. Totally unacceptable. They even charged my credit card for the stay 6 days before hand also.

Reviews.Title: “Warm welcome”
Reviews.Author: colibrina
Reviews.Content: Great and helpful staff, we had a very warm welcome. It was like home! My daughters and I had a wonderful stay in one of the Grimaldi Apartments. The name of it was Lionello. It was very equipped and comfortable, it was located in a quiet area but at the meantime central(at about 6 min. by walking from Rialto's Bridge and about 12 min. by walking from St. Mark's Square). Close by there was Santa Sofia Traghetto, where (for 0,50 â‚¬) a gondola took us on the other side of the Grand Canal and there we could enjoy visiting the famout Rialto's Fish Market, it was very folkloristic. Close by there was a Supermarket open from 8:30 to 8:00 p.m, also on Sunday, it sells also fruits, vegetables, fresh bread, take away dishes. For wine lovers, I suggest to buy a very good bottle of wine to: Bottiglieria Colonna - Castello - San Lio - Calle seconda de la Fava nr. 5595 - Venezia - We had really enjoyed our stay and certanly we will choose again Grimaldi Apartments!

HotelInfo.Name: Grimaldi Appartamenti
HotelInfo.Address: Cannaregio 4385, 30100 Venice, Italy
